title: Bug 108822 - More logical processing expected for disk sorting with border value for row value
OB: When sorting on disk, if we sort 40000 rows of data and set the program to process data less than 40000, the program performs the following operations:
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Sort 40000 rows of data on disk.
2. Set the program to process data less than 40000.
3. Observe the program's operations.
